name: Get Out! (itch) (lucaslealvale)
description:
Get Out!

Can you escape the plane?

-------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD -> Walk

E -> Whistle

SHIFT -> Run

Mouse -> Camera Movement

Left Click -> Grab items/Turn On/Off flashlight

-------------------------------------------------------

For the mac build we suggest:

1. Download the game

2. Unzip it

3. On the terminal run: chmod +x macbuild.app/Contents/MacOS/

4. Then, run: ./macbuild.app/Contents/MacOS/

5. If it doesnt run, go to System Preferences > Security & Privacy > General > Allow game to be executed

-------------------------------------------------------

Thanks for playing! =D
